@usedefault

{{vmexport id:$$id}}

h2. VMExport: ${id}

{{actions:
- display: Update Password
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/user/updatePassword
  data:
   username: ${id}
  input:
  - password

- display: Send Reset Password Link
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/user/sendResetPasswordLink
  data:
   username: ${id}
   email: ${emails}

- display: Delete
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/user/delete
  data:
   username: ${id}
  input:
  - reason
}}

h3. Details
|*GUID*|${guid}|
|*Name*|${name}|
|*Bucket*|${bucket}|
|*Status*|${status}|
|*Size*|${size}|
|*Original Size*|${original_size}|
|*Timestamp*|${timestamp}|
|*Storage Type*|${storagetype}|
|*Type*|${type}|
|*VMachine ID*|[${machineId}|/CBGrid/Virtual Machine?id=${machineId}]|
|*Files*|${files}|
|*Location*|${location}|

h5. Config
{{code:
${config}
}}
